symptoms.name: Runny nose
symptoms.pattern: Initial symptom, similar to common cold

symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.pattern: Initial symptom, similar to common cold

symptoms.name: Mild cough
symptoms.pattern: Initial symptom, progresses to severe coughing fits

symptoms.name: Severe coughing fits
symptoms.pattern: Develops after 1-2 weeks, lasting 2-3 months or longer

symptoms.name: Whooping sound (inspiratory whoop)
symptoms.pattern: High-pitched sound during inhalation after coughing fits, not present in all cases

symptoms.name: Apnea (in infants)
symptoms.pattern: Periods of not breathing, can be life-threatening

symptoms.name: Subconjunctival hemorrhages
symptoms.pattern: Can occur due to violent coughing

symptoms.name: Rib fractures
symptoms.pattern: Can occur due to violent coughing

symptoms.name: Urinary incontinence
symptoms.pattern: Can occur due to violent coughing

symptoms.name: Hernias
symptoms.pattern: Can occur due to violent coughing

symptoms.name: Vertebral artery dissection
symptoms.pattern: Can occur due to violent coughing

symptoms.name: Pneumothorax
symptoms.pattern: Can occur due to pleural rupture from violent coughing

vital_signs.respiratory_rate: Increased in severe cases, apnea in infants

required: Positive Bordetella pertussis culture or PCR
